name: Haru V Neck Sweater
description: Sweater is knitted from top down with drop shoulder sleeves. The upper back is worked first, shaped with short rows then worked to the underarms and placed on hold. Stitches for the the left front are picked up along the sloped cast on edge and knitted down to the underarm with the V neck shaping. And the stitches are then placed on hold while the right front is worked. Underarm onwards, all the stitches are worked in one piece. When the body is completed, the sleeves are picked up along the armhole opening, then worked in the round to the cuff. Stitches for the neckband are picked up along the neckline, and worked 1x1 ribbing back and forth.
full_text: Sweater is knitted from top down with drop shoulder sleeves. The upper back is worked first, shaped with short rows then worked to the underarms and placed on hold. Stitches for the the left front are picked up along the sloped cast on edge and knitted down to the underarm with the V neck shaping. And the stitches are then placed on hold while the right front is worked. Underarm onwards, all the stitches are worked in one piece. When the body is completed, the sleeves are picked up along the armhole opening, then worked in the round to the cuff. Stitches for the neckband are picked up along the neckline, and worked 1x1 ribbing back and forth. S I Z E S 1 (2, 3, 4) B U S T 43 (46 1⁄2, 50, 54 1⁄4) in 109 (118, 127, 138) cm finished bust circumference. The sweater is designed to be worn with 10” / 25cm positive ease at the bust. Y A R N Daylights from Harrisville Designs / DK weight / 100g, 229m. 930 (1030, 1150, 1240) m. N E E D L E S 5mm(US8) 32” or 40” / 80cm or 100cm circular needles for the body. 5mm(US8) DPNs or short circular needles for the sleeves. 4.5mm(US7) 32” or 40” / 80cm or 100cm circular needles for the neckband. 32” or 40” / 80cm or 100cm circular needles can be used if you are familiar with the Magic loop for working the sleeves and neckband in the round. G A U G E 18 stitches 28 rows / stockinette stitch / 10 x 10cm / Large needles / After washing and blocking. T O O L S Stitch markers, scrap yarn, tapestry needle. 함뜨는 라벌리에서 신청받고 카톡 단톡방에서 운영합니다. 신청 방법 : 프로젝트 생성 후 실과 도안 사진 올려주시고 제목에 “함뜨” 라는 키워드를 넣어주세요. 2월 11일에 메세지로 초대 링크 보내드립니다. 신청이 되었는지 확인하는 법 : 이 페이지의 상단에서 ‘project’ 탭을 누르신 후 본인의 프로젝트가 제대로 잘 보이는지 확인해 주세요. 제가 확인해 드리지 못합니다. 신청 기한 : 2월 10일까지 함뜨 기간 : 2월 11일 - 3월 17일까지 프로젝트 생성하는 법 : https://soopknits.com/ravelry/?q=YToxOntzOjEyOiJrZXl3b3JkX3R5cGUiO3M6MzoiYWxsIjt9&bmode=view&idx=14137958&t=board
